'''Simple Vault Key III''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained from a dig spot near a shipwreck in the eastern part of [[Erinnyes Forest]]. It can be found slightly south of the main wreck, buried beside a conch shell.

It is used with [[Simple Vault Key I]] and [[Simple Vault Key II]] to open the vault inside the shipwreck containing a [[Hydroculus]] and a Precious Chest with a [[Foggy Forest Branch]].
